# privx_carrier_config (Data Source)

PrivX Carrier Configuration data source

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "privx_carrier_config" "my_carrier_cfg" {
  id = "my-carrier"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Carrier ID

### Read-Only

- `config` (String) Carrier configuration content
- `session_id` (String) Carrier configuration session ID
